mapper.select: SELECT no,subject,name,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, hit, type, num FROM (SELECT no,subject,name,regdate,hit, type, rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,subject,name,regdate, hit, type FROM board WHERE type=1 ORDER BY regdate DESC)) WHERE (num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE type=1
